## Context

Since the first [Olympic Games](https://olympics.com/en/) in 1896, nearly 300,000 athletes have competed in the games. Your dataset contains a random sample of 8921 athletes who competed in the Olympics between 1896 and 2016.

Variables included in the dataset include:

- `Name` of the athlete
- `Sex` of the athlete
- `Age` of the athlete in years
- `Height` of the athlete in centimeters
- `Weight` of the athlete in kilograms
- `Year` of the Olympic competition
- `Team`: the country for which the athlete competed
- `Season` of the Games: "Summer" or "Winter"
- `Sport` the athlete competed in
- `Medal` won by the athlete
